trans-unit.source: Represents a predicate text string that is used to filter property searches.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于筛选属性搜索的谓词文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilterPredicate"></xref> class with the specified search string.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilterPredicate"></xref>类指定的搜索字符串。

trans-unit.source: The predicate string that is used for the match process.
trans-unit.target: 用于匹配过程中的谓词字符串。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a case-insensitive match of the predicate string is contained within the target string.
trans-unit.target: 指示目标字符串中是否包含谓词字符串的不区分大小写的匹配项。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a case-insensitive match of the predicate string is contained within the target string; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果目标字符串中; 中包含谓词字符串的不区分大小写的匹配项否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.String> that is used to match a property filter predicate string to a target string.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.String>用于与属性筛选器谓词字符串与目标字符串匹配。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A predicate string that contains text for matching.
trans-unit.target: 包含用于匹配的文本的谓词字符串。
